name: portal-chamados
description: Portal de Chamados - Sistema de gerenciamento de tickets

scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,backend "cross-env PORT=3001 BACKEND_PORT=3002 npm run dev -w frontend" "cross-env PORT=3002 npm run dev -w backend"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently -n frontend,backend "cross-env PORT=3001 BACKEND_PORT=3002 npm run dev -w frontend" "cross-env PORT=3002 npm run dev -w backend"
scripts.start: npm run build:frontend && npm start -w backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w frontend && npm install -w backend
